00001 /* LINTLIBRARY */

00003 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00004 #include <config.h>
00005 
00006 #include <stdio.h>
00007 #include <bdd/util.h>
00008 
00009 
00010 #ifdef BSD
00011 #include <sys/types.h>
00012 #include <sys/time.h>
00013 #include <sys/resource.h>
00014 
00015 #if defined(_IBMR2)
00016 #define etext _etext
00017 #define edata _edata
00018 #define end _end
00019 #endif
00020 
00021 extern int end, etext, edata;
00022 
00023 #endif
00024 
00025 void
00026 util_print_cpu_stats(FILE *fp)
00027 {
00028 #ifdef BSD
00029     struct rusage rusage;
00030     struct rlimit rlp;
00031     int text, data, vm_limit, vm_soft_limit;
00032     double user, system, scale;
00033     char hostname[257];
00034     int vm_text, vm_init_data, vm_uninit_data, vm_sbrk_data;
00035 
00036     /* Get the hostname */
00037     (void) gethostname(hostname, 256);
00038     hostname[256] = '\0';               /* just in case */
00039 
00040     /* Get the virtual memory sizes */
00041     vm_text = (int) (((int) (&etext)) / 1024.0 + 0.5);
00042     vm_init_data = (int) (((int) (&edata) - (int) (&etext)) / 1024.0 + 0.5);
00043     vm_uninit_data = (int) (((int) (&end) - (int) (&edata)) / 1024.0 + 0.5);
00044     vm_sbrk_data = (int) (((int) (util_ptrint) sbrk(0) - (int) (&end)) / 1024.0 + 0.5);
00045 
00046     /* Get virtual memory limits */
00047     (void) getrlimit(RLIMIT_DATA, &rlp);
00048     vm_limit = (int) (rlp.rlim_max / 1024.0 + 0.5);
00049     vm_soft_limit = (int) (rlp.rlim_cur / 1024.0 + 0.5);
00050 
00051     /* Get usage stats */
00052     (void) getrusage(RUSAGE_SELF, &rusage);
00053     user = rusage.ru_utime.tv_sec + rusage.ru_utime.tv_usec/1.0e6;
00054     system = rusage.ru_stime.tv_sec + rusage.ru_stime.tv_usec/1.0e6;
00055     scale = (user + system)*100.0;
00056     if (scale == 0.0) scale = 0.001;
00057 
00058     (void) fprintf(fp, "Runtime Statistics\n");
00059     (void) fprintf(fp, "------------------\n");
00060     (void) fprintf(fp, "Machine name: %s\n", hostname);
00061     (void) fprintf(fp, "User time   %6.1f seconds\n", user);
00062     (void) fprintf(fp, "System time %6.1f seconds\n\n", system);
00063 
00064     text = (int) (rusage.ru_ixrss / scale + 0.5);
00065     data = (int) ((rusage.ru_idrss + rusage.ru_isrss) / scale + 0.5);
00066     (void) fprintf(fp, "Average resident text size       = %5dK\n", text);
00067     (void) fprintf(fp, "Average resident data+stack size = %5dK\n", data);
00068     (void) fprintf(fp, "Maximum resident size            = %5ldK\n\n", 
00069         rusage.ru_maxrss/2);
00070     (void) fprintf(fp, "Virtual text size                = %5dK\n", 
00071         vm_text);
00072     (void) fprintf(fp, "Virtual data size                = %5dK\n", 
00073         vm_init_data + vm_uninit_data + vm_sbrk_data);
00074     (void) fprintf(fp, "    data size initialized        = %5dK\n", 
00075         vm_init_data);
00076     (void) fprintf(fp, "    data size uninitialized      = %5dK\n", 
00077         vm_uninit_data);
00078     (void) fprintf(fp, "    data size sbrk               = %5dK\n", 
00079         vm_sbrk_data);
00080     (void) fprintf(fp, "Virtual memory limit             = %5dK (%dK)\n\n", 
00081         vm_soft_limit, vm_limit);
00082 
00083     (void) fprintf(fp, "Major page faults = %ld\n", rusage.ru_majflt);
00084     (void) fprintf(fp, "Minor page faults = %ld\n", rusage.ru_minflt);
00085     (void) fprintf(fp, "Swaps = %ld\n", rusage.ru_nswap);
00086     (void) fprintf(fp, "Input blocks = %ld\n", rusage.ru_inblock);
00087     (void) fprintf(fp, "Output blocks = %ld\n", rusage.ru_oublock);
00088     (void) fprintf(fp, "Context switch (voluntary) = %ld\n", rusage.ru_nvcsw);
00089     (void) fprintf(fp, "Context switch (involuntary) = %ld\n", rusage.ru_nivcsw);
00090 #else
00091     (void) fprintf(fp, "Usage statistics not available\n");
00092 #endif
00093 }
